edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.postboard.model

Class PostBoardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.postboard.model.PostBoardModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel

    public class PostBoardModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel
    This is a model for the post board. It contains all of the messages to be displayed on the board. It extends AbstractListModel so that it can provide the model data to the JList component in the BoardPanel.
    Author:
    Chris Casola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • emptyModel

        public void emptyModel()
        Removes all messages from this model NOTE: One cannot simply construct a new instance of the model, because other classes in this module have references to it. Hence, we manually remove each message from the model.
